page.title: 06THE GOLF HOTEL
page.content: THE GOLF HOTEL IS NEAR THE WOODHALL SPA GOLF COURSE.LICENCES ARE NEEDED TO SELL DRINK ON THE PREMISES,TO ENSURE THE HYGIENE OF THE FOOD,AND ALSO CLEANLINESS.IF FOREIGNERS COME TO THE HOTEL THEY ARE USUALLY AMERICANS.MOSTLY THE PEOPLE WHO COME TO THE HOTEL ARE BUSINESS MEN.THE GOLF HOTEL HAS 51 BEDROOMS ALL WITH PRIVATE BATHROOMS;EACH ROOM HAS A COLOUR TELEVISION,RADIO,TEA AND COFFEEMAKING FACILITIES.THERE IS A RESTAURANT AND A BAR OVERLOOKING THE LAWNS.THERE ARE ALSO LOUNGES,CONFERENCE ROOMS AND AUDIO VISUAL EQUIPMENT.ENTERTAINMENT INCLUDES DISCOS,CABARET,AND BANDS.IT IS A THREE STAR HOTEL.THE GOLF HOTEL ADVERTISES ALL OVER THE COUNTRY,AND ALSO IN AMERICA AND THE PHILLIPINES. THE HOTEL IS BEAUTIFULLY SITUATED AND VERY DELIGHTFUL.
